      • TransactionLog

        public TransactionLog()

    • Method Detail

      • addTransaction

        public void addTransaction(java.lang.String transName,
                           double transAmount,
                           java.lang.String transType)
        Parameters:
        transName - Passes the transaction name to be added to table column 0.
        transAmount - Passes the transaction amount to be added to table column 1.
        transType - Passes the transaction type to be added to table column 2.

      • addTransactionType

        public void addTransactionType(double transAmount,
                               java.lang.String transType)
        Parameters:
        transAmount - Gets the transaction amount to add it to the specified transaction type, and subtract it from the balance.
        transType - Gets the transaction type to add to the total of the specified transaction type.

      • deleteTransaction

        public void deleteTransaction()
        Deletes a transaction from the table.

      • deleteTransactionType

        public void deleteTransactionType(double transAmount,
                                  java.lang.String transType)
        Parameters:
        transAmount - Gets the transaction amount to delete it from the transaction type and add it back to the balance.
        transType - Gets the transaction type to determine where the amount needs to be deleted from.

      • clearAllTransactions

        public void clearAllTransactions()
        Sets all transaction types to 0. Removes all rows within the table.
